Package sledgehammer.event

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AliveEvent
    Event that is sent when a Player is marked 'Alive'.
    ChatEvent
    PlayerEvent that handles a chat-related events.
    ChatMessageEvent
    Event passed that contains a ChatMessage with the ChatChannel.
    CheaterEvent
    PlayerEvent to handle activated cheat detections in the Sledgehammer engine and the PZ server.
    ClientEvent
    PlayerEvent that handles Lua-Client communication with LuaNet.
    CommandEvent
    Event that handles Commands sent to the Sledgehammer engine.
    ConnectEvent
    PlayerEvent that is passed when a Player connected to the PZ server.
    CoOpAccessEvent
    CoOpEvent to handle Access requests to the PZ server.
    CoOpEvent
    Abstract Event to identify the subset of Co-Op related Events fired in the PZ server and sent to the Sledgehammer engine.
    DeathEvent
    PlayerEvent to pass when a Player dies.
    DisconnectEvent
    PlayerEvent to pass when a Player disconnects from the PZ Server.
    Event
    Class designed to handle common event operations and utilities for Sledgehammer's EventManager.
    GenericEvent
    This is an Event sub-type that allows Modules to author commands, and send them to other modules for evaluation and execution.
    HandShakeEvent
    PlayerEvent to handle dispatching the SledgehammerLua handshake with the Sledgehammer engine and the registered Modules listening for the HandshakeEvent.
    LogEvent
    Event to store and manage logging data for other Events, as well as any additional logging pushed from registered Modules in the Sledgehammer engine.
    PlayerCreatedEvent
    PlayerEvent sent when a Player is created.
    PlayerEvent
    Abstract Event that associates a Player with Player-oriented Events in the Sledgehammer engine.
    PlayerInfoEvent
    PlayerEvent that handles the transmission of a Players position, and meta-position.
    PostConnectEvent
    PlayerEvent to send when a Player has finished connecting to the PZ server.
    PreConnectEvent
    Event that is passed when a Player attempts to connect to the PZ server.
    PVPAttackEvent
    Event to dispatch when a Player attacks another Player.
    PVPEvent
    PlayerEvent to dispatch When a Player is affected or Authors a PVPEvent.
    PVPKillEvent
    Event to dispatch when a Player kills another Player.
    ScriptEvent
    Event to dispatch when a native LuaEvent is fired on the PZ Server.
